text: Gosha Academy. A school in Gosha Village and an institution for training young Taimanin.
Prospective Taimanin had gathered in the training facility that had been built beneath the school grounds. Today was the day of the practical exam.
As one would expect of a school for Taimanin, during the exam period, in addition to general subjects such as Japanese and mathematics, a practical exam was also conducted.

name: Me
text: (As someone with no Ninja Art, I've always held back tears during these practical exams... But this time is going to be different.)
The test this time was a squad battle. In other words, we would fight as a team.

name: Me
text: (I'm confident in my leadership. And I've already teamed up several times with Hebiko and Shikanosuke in actual battles.)

name: Me
text: (The two of them are used to my commands. That means we have an overwhelming advantage, and even getting top marks wouldn't be a pipe dream.)

name: Me
text: (And if we can do that, I can negotiate with Tokiko for more allowance!)
ーThat's what I had thought, but...

name: Me
text: Whaaaaaaaaaaa!?

name: Yatsu Murasaki
text: Fuma!!! Be quiet!!!
I let out an involuntary shout and was scolded by Murasaki-sensei.

name: Me
text: (I mean... I mean I didn't expect both Hebiko and Shikanosuke to be on other teams...)
My team didn't include Hebiko and Shikanosuke, and my two teammates were students I had never worked with before. How could I not scream?

name: Murasaki
text: The losing team will have to take an additional exam. Alright, separate into teams!

name: Me
text: Ugh... my plans to get a bigger allowance...

name: Uehara Shikanosuke
text: Hey, Fuma! Don't be disappointed that I'm not with you!

name: Aishu Hebiko
text: It is what it is. Just do your best, Fuma-chan.

name: Me
text: Hrrmm... Judging by your reaction, you two are on the same team?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Yeah.

name: Hebiko
text: That's right.

name: Me
text: And who's the third person?

name: Mizuki Yukikaze
text: Me!!! Isn't that too bad, lonesome Fuma!

name: Me
text: M-Mizuki Yukikaze!? Really...!?
Yukikaze was known as the "Lightning Taimanin" and was capable enough to already go on actual combat missions.

name: Hebiko
text: It's a shame for Fuma-chan, but... jackpot! To be teaming up with Yukikaze-chan... here comes that top score!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Being on Yukikaze's team is almost like we've already won! I feel bad for you though, Fuma!

name: Me
text: You guys...

name: Hebiko
text: Ehehe... an exam is an exam♪

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hehehe, sorry, Fuma.

name: Me
text: Damn it! Get lost! From this day forth, you're all enemies!
However, there was no way to change what had been decided. I reluctantly moved to my team's location.

name: Me
text: (Let's see... my teammates are...)
Standing there wasー

name: Kamimura Maika
text: Hm? Gimme a break, I'm with the silver spoon kid!?
A red-haired girl stared at me with her eyes wide open.

name: Maika
text: What's with the long face? Well, let's do this!

name: Me
text: Kamimura Maika...
Kamimura Maika was one of my classmates and a Fire Art user.
With their Fire Jutsu, Fire Art users could burn their enemies with roaring flames. It was a flashy, easy to understand, and celebrated Ninja Art.
And among the Fire Art users, she was considered an outstanding candidate to carry the future of the Fire Art Taimanin.

name: Me
text: (If we're only talking about firepower, she's as good as Yukikaze, butー)

name: Maika
text: Listen up, Fuma! I'm fine on my own. If ya get in my way, I'll burn ya to a crisp, got it!?

name: Me
text: (Eeeeeep... she doesn't give a shiiiit about working as a team...)
The problem was her personality. After all, she was feared as the biggest delinquent in the whole school.

name: Me
text: (And the final memberー)

name: Yubashiri Hayate
text: My teammates are... Don't tell me it's you two?

name: Me
text: Yubashiri Hayate...

name: Hayate
text: I never thought I'd be paired with two hoodlums...
It was Yubashiri Hayate, the daughter of the prestigious Yubashiri Clan.
Although still young, she was an excellent archer, but she was also known for being overly serious and stubborn, which made her the exact opposite of the delinquent Maika.

name: Hayate
text: Alright, both of you stay out of my way.

name: Maika
text: Huh? Wha'dya just say, ya useless spoiled princess?!

name: Hayate
text: I said if you stay out of my way, I'll make sure you get a good grade.

name: Maika
text: Huuh? I'll blow your ass up!!

name: Hayate
text: You delinquent. How about I shoot you in that big mouth of yours!?

name: Me
text: (Wooooow...!!! These girls reeeeally don't want to work as a team!)

name: Murasaki
text: Did you separate into teams? Representatives, come and get the match list! The number next to yours will be your opponent.

name: Me
text: Let's see...
Leaving the two of them to their bickering, I received the match list from Murasaki-sensei.

name: Me
text: ーUm, hmm? Murasaki-sensei.

name: Murasaki
text: What is it?

name: Me
text: Here, our team's opponent is blank though...?
On the printout I had been handed, the space for our team's opponent was the only spot that was blank.

name: Murasaki
text: Yes, that's because there's one team left over if you split into teams of three.

name: Murasaki
text: So, especially for you...
Murasaki-sensei's expression softened ever so slightly.

name: Murasaki
text: Asagi-sama☆ ...No, er... the headmistress will be your opponent.

name: Me
text: Huh!?! Headmistress Asagi!?

name: Murasaki
text: Of course you'd literally be defeated in an instant if she took it seriously.

name: Murasaki
text: So as a handicap, the headmistress will stand alone against you three.

name: Me
text: As a handicap...

name: Murasaki
text: The Almighty Taimanin will be your opponent. I'm so jeal... I mean, you better be grateful.

name: Me
text: Uh huh...

name: Me
text: (It's over... I'm done...)
I had witnessed Headmistress Asagi's strength during Gaiza's attack.
Even though there were three of us and we were all capable, we were still just students.

name: Me
text: (And we have zero teamwork. It's absolutely impossible...)

name: Maika
text: Woohoo!!! We're gonna fight against the headmistress!? I'm gettin' fired up!!!

name: Hayate
text: The tension is rising!

name: Me
text: Y-You sure are motivated... H-Hey! Let's have a strategy meeting!!
The other teams knew their opponents and also had begun to discuss their strategies.

name: Maika
text: Who gives a rat's ass about that! Stay outta my way, both of ya!

name: Hayate
text: I can't let a delinquent like you have the honor of fighting Headmistress Asagi.

name: Maika
text: Wha'djou say!?

name: Hayate
text: Hmph. Come at me?

name: Me
text: ...This is a disaster. (smh)
As I held my head in my handsー

name: Igawa Asagi
text: Fuma-kun, best of luck.
I heard footsteps, and Headmistress Asagi appeared, dressed in her Taima-Suit.

name: Me
text: Headmistress Asagi!! Hmm, uh...

name: Asagi
text: What is it?

name: Me
text: Why am I separated from Hebiko and Shikanosuke? All the other teams are people that always work together...

name: Asagi
text: Hehe. That's because you're the captain of the Independent Commando Unit.

name: Asagi
text: Everyone else generally teams up with other Taimanin in actual combat. But not in your case.

name: Asagi
text: There are times where you need to hire mercenaries from shady cities or where you need to work with people who were your enemies just yesterday. Do you understand?

name: Me
text: Yes...
I understood her intentions.
Not only had I been separated from Hebiko and Shikanosuke, but I also had been paired with Maika and Hayate, who were complete opposites of each other in terms of personality.

name: Me
text: (Alright... I guess then we'll just have to do it. I'll give it my all...!)
A leadership style that brings out the best in everyone, no matter their personality or strengths.

name: Me
text: (I should be able to do thatー!!)
